title: Starting a Food Forest on the Cheap!

subtasks: Posting on Facebook to request seeds and cuttings
Researching the proper care for each fruit type
Collecting seeds and cuttings from friends and resources
Planting seeds in deep root pots and covering them with moist peat moss
Transferring cuttings to a suitable growing environment
Watering and maintaining the newly planted seeds and cuttings
Sharing excess plants with other gardeners

tasks.task: Preparing the area for the food forest
subtasks: Choosing a location close to other garden areas
Planning the layout with different layers of plants
Integrating various fruit trees, shrubs, and beneficial plants

tasks.task: Establishing a system of accountability and sharing
subtasks: Sharing seeds and cuttings with friends and community
Encouraging others to participate in starting a food forest
